Uses of Package
fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall

  • Packages that use fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall
    Limited form of asynchronous calls with future for BCM.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall.connections
    Ports and connectors for a limited form of asynchronous calls with future for BCM4Java.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall.example
    Ports and connectors fora limited form of asynchronous calls with future for BCM4Java.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAsyncCall
    The class AbstractAsyncCall implements a form of command pattern to provide a limited asynchronous call with future capability to BCM.
    AsyncCallI
    The interface AsyncCallI declares the methods to be implemented by an asynchronous call class.
    AsyncCallServerPlugin
    The class AsyncCallServerPlugin implements a protocol to be called asynchronously by another component to which the result is sent back using another asynchronous call.
    RemoteCompletableFuture
    The class RemoteCompletableFuture implements a kind of CompletableFuture that can't be cancelled, to be used to implement a limited form of RMI asynchronous calls with future.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall.connections 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAsyncCall
    The class AbstractAsyncCall implements a form of command pattern to provide a limited asynchronous call with future capability to BCM.
    AsyncCallCI
    The component interface AsyncCallCI defines the signature to be used to perform an asynchronous call.
    AsyncCallResultReceptionCI
    The component interface AsyncCallResultReceptionCI defines the method used to send the result of an asynchronous call to the caller real time component.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.asynccall.example 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAsyncCall
    The class AbstractAsyncCall implements a form of command pattern to provide a limited asynchronous call with future capability to BCM.
    AsyncCallClientPlugin
    The class AsyncCallClientPlugin implements a protocol to call asynchronously another component with a limited form of promise or future variable as result.
    AsyncCallI
    The interface AsyncCallI declares the methods to be implemented by an asynchronous call class.
